snippet.title: GigaBash - Rawa Official Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
#Rawa, the Dragon King makes his grave return, ushering in an ashen empire bathed in ethereal flame! What grand announcement awaits us beyond his destructive wake?

#GigaBash is coming to Epic Games Store, Steam, PlayStation®️4 & PlayStation®️5 on August 5, 2022. 

GigaBash is a 4 player Arena Brawler featuring Giant Monsters, Kaijus & Heroes developed by Passion Republic Games. Unleash mayhem in fully destructible maps and battle among your friends as you rise as the true Apex among Titans.

Wishlist now on Epic Games Store! https://epic.gm/gigabash
